trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event of a <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerar den metod som hanterar den **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** händelsen för en <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The FormsAuthenticationEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: Delegaten FormsAuthenticationEventHandler har definierats för <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>händelsen för <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>klass.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Du kan komma åt den <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>händelsen för den <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>klass genom att ange en subrutin med namnet **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** i filen Global.asax för ASP.NET-program.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.

The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>skapar en <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs>objekt med aktuellt <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>och skickar det till den **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** händelse.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> object supplied to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Du kan använda den <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>egenskapen för den <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs>objekt som angetts för den **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** händelsen för att ange den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>egenskapen för aktuellt <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>till en anpassad <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used.
trans-unit.target: Om du inte anger ett värde för den <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>egenskapen under den **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** händelse, den identitet som tillhandahålls av biljetten för formulär för autentisering i cookie eller URL används.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: Den **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** händelsen kan endast aktiveras när autentiseringen <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>anges till <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>och <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>är en aktiva HTTP-modul för programmet.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>
